name: King of Unblock
description:
King of Unblock is a simple and addictive puzzle game.
The goal is to unblock the red block out of the board by sliding the other blocks out of the way, unblock it with the minimal moves.
It will be a long saga to complete all the addictive puzzles.

* 440 of Unblock puzzles in total for you to enjoy
* 3 fun themes such as Wooden theme, Crystals theme or Candy theme
* Keep track of all the puzzles you've cleared
* Undo & Restart system
* Hours of entertainment

Try to finish the game in as little moves as possible and increase your IQ and logical thinking. This game can help you train your brain and keep you mentally fit everyday. It suits perfectly for kids and adult of all ages. It's easy to play but hard to master!

You can't go wrong with this super addictive puzzle game! Purchase it now!
